TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 709
TEI.2.document_title: Mozea Tousseau to Stephen F Austin, 11-19-1831

barker_notes.barker_summary: Mozea Rousseau to Austin, November 19, 1831. Order for $70 worth of cows and calves.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 709

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Mozea Rousseau to Austin, November 19, 1831. Order for $70 worth of cows and calves.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Col. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*will be so good as to pay *person_mentioned*James Haggard*/person_mentioned* seventy dollars worth of Cows, and Calves and this will be good in our settlement and you will oblige your Friend*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*MOZEA ROUSSEAU*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="11-19-1831">19th Nov 1831*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*Good for forty Dollars in Cows, and Calves*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S M Williams*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*To a/c *date_mentioned n="11-29-1831">Nov. 29, 1831*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*P. A*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*/div1*
